name: Tahini Oatmeal Cookies Vegan Gluten free
description: These 1 Bowl Tahini Oatmeal Cookies have no refined sugar and oil and come together within minutes. Eggless, Vegan, Glutenfree, Nutfree, Soyfree Tahini Oat Cookie Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup tahini ((mix the tahini well and then measure))
1/3 cup maple syrup ((see note for substitute))
3/4 cup oat flour ((use all purpose flour if not glutenfree))

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 345 deg F (175  C). Add all the wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 345 deg F (175  C). Add all the wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1/2 cup flour and the rest of the dry ingredients, except oats and flaked salt. Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon lightly with a spoon before mixing into the wet.
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1/2 cup flour and the rest of the dry ingredients, except oats and flaked salt. Mix the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon lightly with a spoon before mixing into the wet.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the oats and fold in. Add the remaining oat flour and mix in until the mixture is a stiff batter like state. Chill for 15 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the oats and fold in. Add the remaining oat flour and mix in until the mixture is a stiff batter like state. Chill for 15 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Use a scoop to place scoops of the mixture onto parchment lined baking sheet. Using wet hands flatten and shape. Sprinkle flaked salt on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Use a scoop to place scoops of the mixture onto parchment lined baking sheet. Using wet hands flatten and shape. Sprinkle flaked salt on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 345 deg F for 12 to 14 mins. Cool for 10 mins.Store: on the counter for upto 4 days. Refrigerate for 2 weeks.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 345 deg F for 12 to 14 mins. Cool for 10 mins.Store: on the counter for upto 4 days. Refrigerate for 2 weeks.
